price: “Şefaat, tümüyle Allah’a aittir. Göklerin ve yerin mülkü O’nundur. Sonra O’na döndürüleceksiniz.''
arabic: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ جَمِيعٗاۖ لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qul lillahi al-shafāʿatu jamīʿan lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
